roleset.name: have a lot of
roleset.note: SUFFUSE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'suffuse' based on sentences in brown. (from suffuse.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: pseudopassive
example.text: Seeking an obscure, dark, relatively quiet corner in [the airy room]-1 otherwise suffused [*]-1 with afternoon sunshine, he asked if the soft background music could be turned off.

example.name: active
example.text: I thought I saw a faint surge of color rise to her neck and quickly suffuse her cheeks.
